member.summary: Interface for TransitionMapper

member.name: P:Plugin.SharedTransitions.ITransitionMapper.TransitionStack
member.summary: Transition stack containing all the registered shared transitions

members.member:
Get the transition stack associated to a page
Page to check Group to filter, if set to null will search for Group=null, dont use this to ignore group filter /// True to completely ignore the filter group

member.summary: Add transition information for the specified Page to the TransitionStack
member.param: The name of the shared transition.
The transition group for dynamic transitions.
if true, rasterize the snapshot in iOS
The Xamarin Forms view associated to this transition.

member.name: M:Plugin.SharedTransitions.Transition.GetLightSnapshot(Xamarin.Forms.BindableObject)
member.summary: Performs a "Light" snapshot on iOS, rasterizing a copy of the current view to use during the transition. This method is faster but doesnt play well with transformations (size, borders, ecc...). Use it only when animating the element position! Does nothing on Anddroid
